records.Comments__c: A solid snorkeling experience with a great crew and amazing sights. They could improve the organization at the start, but once we got going, it was incredible.
Absolutely phenomenal experience! The variety of fish and coral we saw was amazing. The guides made sure we felt safe and comfortable throughout the adventure.
Loved every minute of our snorkel adventure! The team was professional, and the sites chosen were full of life. A must-do for anyone visiting the area.
Good snorkel trip with lots to see. The gear was decent, though could use an update. Staff was helpful and made the trip enjoyable.
The location was stunning, but the experience felt a bit overpriced for what was offered. The guides were nice, though, and we saw plenty of fish.
Unfortunately, our trip was marred by bad weather, leading to poor visibility underwater. Not the company's fault, but it was disappointing.
The adventure was nice, but a bit crowded. It felt a little rushed and not as personalized as I hoped. Still, the marine life was beautiful.
The Tropical Snorkel Adventure was breathtaking! The guides were knowledgeable and friendly, and the underwater scenery was unlike anything I've ever seen. Highly recommend.
Great experience overall! The water was clear, and we saw a lot of marine life. Only wish it was a bit longer, but would definitely go again.
An unforgettable snorkeling adventure! The guides were incredibly passionate about marine conservation, which added so much value to our experience.
